modName: Quit it with the bullying Braith
summary: Stops Braith from continuing to bully Lars after you have words with her about it
descriptionHtml:
[center]﻿[/center][center][color=#ff7700][size=6][font=Comic Sans MS]Quit it with the bullying, Braith[/font][/size][/color][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff7700][size=6]![/size][/color][/font]

[size=5][color=#ffe599]Tired of Braith continuing to bully Lars even after you've had words with her?[/color]

[color=#fff2cc]Tired of her forever bad mouthing you?! (Optional)[/color]

Then you need this!

[font=Tahoma][u]WHAT THIS DOES[/u][/font]

A [i]very [/i]simple mod to stop Braith from bothering Lars [i]after [/i]you've had words with her.
She'll continue to do so [i]until[/i] you've spoken with her, just like vanilla.

(There are 3 scenes that continue to play out between Lars and Braith [i]regardless [/i]of whether you've had words with her or not - there is [i]one[/i] scene only that stops  so chances are you'll spot her still at it around Whiterun.)

Optional version stops her dissing you afterwards as well (vanilla dialogue [i]only[/i]. [i]Other[/i] mods may add extra lines, I can't fix that, sorry.)
[/size][size=5][size=4]
[size=5][size=5]~~~~~~~~[/size][/size]
[color=#b6d7a8]How to install:[/color]
Just install with MO or NMM or drop the files in manually.
[color=#b6d7a8]How to remove:[/color]
Use your mod managers uninstaller or remove manually. No special steps necessary.
[size=5][size=4][color=#b6d7a8]Is it safe to remove?[/color]
There are no scripts and nothing is baked into the savegame so it should be safe to remove at any time.[/size][/size]
[size=5][size=4][color=#b6d7a8]Does this mean that Braith will finally stop dissing me/bullying Lars? Really?!
[/color][/size][/size]Yes, yes it does. She'll quit bullying Lars entirely or optionally dissing you too
(other mods may [i]add[/i]  lines that this mod [i]cannot[/i] touch,
Relationship Dialogue Overhaul will add "Leave me alone!" for example)
[color=#b6d7a8]Why can't you fix extra lines this mod [i]doesn't  [/i]touch? Such as RDO's?[/color]
It requires permission from the mod author(s) and RDO's has closed permissions currently.
[size=5][size=4][color=#b6d7a8]Why did you make it? I love Braiths attitude![/color][/size][/size][size=5][size=4]
Someone asked if such a mod existed and couldn't find one, and to be honest its something that bugs me too, if you've had words with her that ought to be the end of her bullying especially as she states she's stopped it. Bethesda got lazy basically.[/size][/size] If you like her attitude to you then thats still available.
[size=5][size=4][size=5][size=4][color=#b6d7a8]So what lines does the full version affect/remove?[/color][/size][/size][/size][/size]
[i]"What're you lookin' at? I'm not afraid of you, ya know. Even if you are my elder."
'Boys, girls, dogs, elders - there's nobody I won't fight!'
'We done?'
'Finally. I got stuff to do, ya know."[/i]
[/size][/size][size=5][size=4][color=#b6d7a8][color=#ffffff][color=#b6d7a8][color=#ffffff][size=6]
[/size][color=#ff0000][font=Comic Sans MS][size=6]Help! She's still saying "Leave me alone!" / other lines to me even though I have the full version! Whats going on?[/size][/font]

[color=#ffffff][size=5]Other mods can and do add extra lines to her notably RDO (Relationship Dialogue Overhaul) and I don't have permission to patch it, sorry.

Also you MUST speak to Lars about her first and THEN convince her to stop. Until then her dialogue will be the same and she'll continue to bully Lars as always.[/size][/color][/color][/color][/color][/color][/color][/size][/size][/center]
author: Soupdragon
